entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14
entry.content:

âœ… SparkyChat is live again! â€ƒLog your food, water, weight, and custom measurements directly via chatbot. Note: Some chatbot features may not work perfectly yet â€” improvements are ongoing! I tested with Google Gemini alone. So don't raise issue with ChatBot or its related features till I fine tune it better

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.1
entry.content:
ğŸš€ Release: Improved Diary Insights & AI Provider Update We're excited to roll out the latest update with enhanced nutrition tracking, performance fixes, and improved diagnostics!

âœ¨ New Features Fiber Tracking Added: Mini Nutrition chart, food detail view, and subtotals now include fiber data for a more complete nutrition overview.

ğŸ”§ Fixes & Enhancements ğŸ’§ Water Intake Fix: Resolved issues affecting water tracking accuracy.

ğŸ” Encryption Diagnostics: Improved logging to help identify inadequate or missing encryption keys.

ğŸ§  AI Provider Update: Removed all AI models except Gemini, our only fully-tested and supported AI provider for now.

As always, your feedback helps us growâ€”keep it coming!

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.2
entry.content:
POC fix for auto log out when refreshing the browser.

Update your nginx/other proxy to include below settings. Without this, authentication might have issue based on your proxy

proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme; add_header X-Content-Type-Options "nosniff"; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Ssl on;

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • [x] AI chatbot clear button
  • [x] Dark theme - background color fix for food unit selection in Diary page
  • [x] Rounded decimal points for Nutrition summary screen
